akn:subsection.akn:heading: Consideration of borrowers for loan service programs

akn:content.akn:p: (e) Consideration of borrowers for loan service programs The Secretary shall consider a farmer program borrower for all loan service programs if, within 60 days after receipt of the notice required in this section or, in extraordinary circumstances as determined by the applicable State director, after the 60-day period, the borrower requests such consideration in writing. In considering a borrower for loan service programs, the Secretary shall place the highest priority on the preservation of the borrower’s farming operations.
